short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add the reading time badge before the title to an any blog post

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Reading Time Badge is a Chrome extension that adds a badge to all pages where an article HTML tag is present. This extension is designed to help users estimate of the time it will take to read the article. When an article tag is detected, the extension adds a badge above the article's title. 

The Reading Time Badge is a great tool for anyone who frequently reads articles online and wants to better manage their time. The estimated reading time feature helps users to prioritize which articles to read first, and also allows them to plan their reading time accordingly. With this extension, users can easily find and read articles on any webpage without wasting time on articles that may be too lengthy.

Overall, the Reading Time Badge is a simple and useful tool that enhances the reading experience by providing important information upfront. It saves time and helps users to stay organized and focused on their reading goals.
